Package state

Interface IUserState

All Known Implementing Classes:
UserState
public interface IUserState
IUserState is an interface representing the portion of the application that contains all the registered User information.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void addUser​(User user)
    Add a new User instance to the user state
    Map<String,​User> getAllUsers()  
    User getCurrentUser()  
    void setCurrentUser​(User user)
    Set the currently logged-in user to the specified user

  • Method Details

    • addUser

      void addUser​(User user)
      Add a new User instance to the user state
      Parameters:
      user - user

    • getAllUsers

      Map<String,​User> getAllUsers()
      Returns:
      A collection of all registered users

    • getCurrentUser

      User getCurrentUser()
      Returns:
      The currently logged-in user if there is one, or null otherwise

    • setCurrentUser

      void setCurrentUser​(User user)
      Set the currently logged-in user to the specified user
      Parameters:
      user - user
